response.answer_text: You don’t; there is nothing to solve. a+(b+c) is exactly the same thing as a+b+c. It’s exactly the same thing as (a+b)+c or b+(c+a) It’s exactly the the same no matter how you add three thing like a and b and c.
First you have to solve b+c in the brackets and then add the answer with a that you get by b+c.
